price: ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߕߍߣߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߟߴߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߝߋߎ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߓߊ߯ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ߬ ߘߌߡߌ߲ߣߍ߲ ߦߋ߫
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
